title: Kylie Jenner posts clip of Stormi playing with True, Chicago and Dream
text:
Kylie Jenner just went through a breakup with her rapper boyfriend Travis Scott.

And now the 22-year-old billionaire entrepreneur seems to be focusing on her daughter, Stormi, as she recovers from the shock of being newly single.

On Friday the beauty shared a video of her mini-me playing with her cousins at a giant toddler play place. 'These girls are getting so big i can't handle it .. thank you God for them ♥️,' said the Kylie Cosmetics founder in her caption.

A bond: Kylie Jenner shared a sweet video of her daughter Stormi, far right, having fun in a playground with her cousins (from left) Dream, Chicago and True on Friday

Done: Jenner just went through a breakup with her rapper boyfriend Travis Scott. Here they are seen this summer

Stormi was in a shirt that had writing on the back that read 'Wish you were here' which may have been a message for daddy Scott.

She was closest to True, who is the one-year-old daughter of Khloe Kardashian and basketball star Tristan Thompson, which split ion February.

True had on a pink top and leggings with matching fuzzy boots. Her hair was pulled back in a top knot showing off her diamond earrings.

All good friends: The four cousins are either age one or two and often play together

Also in the group was Chicago, who had on a grey hoodie and her hair done in different buns.

She is the daughter of Kim Kardahsian and Kanye West and is also age one. She has three siblings: North, Saint and Psalm.

The child who was playing with the spinner on the wall was Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna's daughter Dream. At age two, she is the oldest in the group.

Stormi, left, was in a shirt that had writing on the back that read 'Wish you were here' which may have been a message for daddy Scott. True, right, who is the one-year-old daughter of Khloe Kardashian and basketball star Tristan Thompson, wore pink

More: Also in the group was Chicago, left, who is the daughter of Kim Kardahsian and Kanye West and is also age one. Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna's daughter Dream, right, is age two

Homage to North: A fan noticed that Chicago was wearing a hoodie that had Kim and North on the front

Little Dream had on a blue shirt with red hearts with dark slacks and red shoes with her hair was pulled up.

THE LITTLE GIRLS Dream Kardashian Parents: Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian Born: November 10, 2016 Chicago West Parents: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West Born: January 15, 2018 Stormi Webster Parents: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott Born: February 1, 2018 True Thompson Parents: Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson Born: April 12, 2018

This clip comes soon after Kim shared a darling video clip of her fourth child, Psalm, to her Instagram account.

The little boy, who is only four months old, was in all black as he laid in a crib with white sheets and blankets.

In the caption, the reality TV star - who will turn 39-years-old this month - said her second son is starting to look like his older brother Saint, aged three.

The camera is focused on Psalm for several seconds as Kim, who is never seen in the clip, can be heard cooing over the little wonder.

'Hi cutie, look at my baby!' the KKW Beauty mogul says as clatter is heard in the background.

'Hi cutie, hi Psalm, you want to talk so badly!' she says as she laughs.

Psalm moves his arms around and at one point sticks his tongue out.

She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019.

Kim and husband Kanye West are parents to four children together: North, Saint, three, Chicago, who turns two in January, and Psalm.

All together now: Kris, Kylie, Kim, Kourtney and Khloe with their kids in April 2019

Kanye recently bought a ranch just outside of Cody, Wyoming, according to TMZ; the asking price was $14 million.

It is not known how much Kanye shelled out, although the website noted he did not pay full price.

The ranch has eight lodging units, two freshwater lakes, meeting facilities and an event center; the property - called Monster Lake Ranch - is nine thousand acres. Kanye owns 4,500 acres of it and the rest is leased from the federal government, the outlet reported.

Her baby boy: Kim shared a darling video clip of her fourth child, Psalm, to her Instagram account on Friday

Kim shared a snap while spending time in Wyoming with Kanye and their children on September 17 while enjoying an outdoor meal during sunset.

Three days earlier, the brunette beauty shared a snap captioned 'Wyoming' with North and Chicago seated on a horse in a field with Kim holding on to the reins.

On Friday Kim and her sisters launched the website KardashianKloset.com where fans can buy their old designer clothes, shoes and bags.

Balmain and Versace purses went within the first hour.

Her mother Kris Jenner also had several items for sale by Fendi and Adidas.

Matcher? Kim said he first started to look like Chicago. Here Chicago, right, is seen at home in an Instagram post from September
description: On Friday the beauty shared a video of her mini-me playing with her cousins at a giant toddler play place. 'These girls are getting so big i can't handle it .. thank you God for them ♥️,' said Kylie.
